dublin_core.dcvalue: Several countries use DHIS2 data to produce secure digital certificates for COVID-19 vaccination or negative test results, through integration with external software applications and alignment with national, regional and global standards, including WHO guidelines. These documents provide a overview of the different facets of DHIS2 implementation.
